name: Investigator Name Generator
description: Unleash your inner Sherlock! Need a moniker that screams mystery, intrigue, and maybe just a touch of danger? Our Investigator Name Generator will craft the perfect alias for your next case, character, or caffeine-fueled brainstorming session. Because every great detective needs a name that's as sharp as their observation skills.
introduction: Welcome, future sleuths! Forget 'John Doe' – you deserve a name that commands respect (and maybe a little fear). Whether you're writing a gripping thriller, role-playing a cunning detective, or just need a cool nickname for your online gaming, our generator is your secret weapon. Get ready to uncover a name that's truly *elementary*, my dear Watson!
howToUse: Click the 'Generate' button (it's the one that looks like pure awesome).
Marvel at the ridiculously cool investigator names that appear before your very eyes.
If a name tickles your fancy, snatch it up! It's yours to use and abuse (responsibly, of course).
Don't like what you see? Hit 'Generate' again! We've got more names than there are clues at a crime scene.
Pro Tip: Mix and match prefixes and suffixes for extra creative flair. We dare you!

faqs.question: Is this generator actually going to help me solve a real crime?
faqs.answer: While we can't promise you'll crack the next Zodiac case, we *can* guarantee a name that'll make you feel like you could. Actual crime-solving skills not included.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for commercial purposes?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Consider them royalty-free inspiration. Go forth and create, my friend! Just maybe give us a shout-out if you become a billionaire detective novelist. ;)

faqs.question: Are the generated names copyrighted?
faqs.answer: Nope! They're fresh out of the idea oven and free for you to use. Go wild!

faqs.question: I got a really weird name... is that normal?
faqs.answer: Perfectly normal! Embrace the weirdness. Sometimes the most unusual names are the most memorable. Plus, you can always hit 'Generate' again!

faqs.question: Will using a generated name make me a better investigator?
faqs.answer: It might give you the confidence boost you need! A great name is half the battle, right? The other half is probably coffee and a trench coat.

faqs.question: How often is the generator updated with new names?
faqs.answer: We're constantly adding new prefixes and suffixes to keep the names fresh and exciting. Check back often for a new dose of investigatory awesomeness!
